ing: 2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers premium tequila blanco
des: "An old friend of mine, famous tequila maker, made this margarita for me. I like it because the fresh juice makes me feel healthy, while the tequila makes my spirit feel better. The agave honey is a delicious alternative to sugar, which makes this margarita even better!"
ins: Blend the tangerine juice, ice, tequila, and agave nectar in a blender until the ice is thoroughly crushed. Dispense into 2 margarita glasses to serve.
